Error: Calling setState synchronously within an effect can trigger cascading renders

Effects are intended to synchronize state between React and external systems such as manually updating the DOM, state management libraries, or other platform APIs. In general, the body of an effect should do one or both of the following:
* Update external systems with the latest state from React.
* Subscribe for updates from some external system, calling setState in a callback function when external state changes.

Calling setState synchronously within an effect body causes cascading renders that can hurt performance, and is not recommended. (https://react.dev/learn/you-might-not-need-an-effect).

Error: Calling setState synchronously within an effect can trigger cascading renders

Effects are intended to synchronize state between React and external systems such as manually updating the DOM, state management libraries, or other platform APIs. In general, the body of an effect should do one or both of the following:
* Update external systems with the latest state from React.
* Subscribe for updates from some external system, calling setState in a callback function when external state changes.

Calling setState synchronously within an effect body causes cascading renders that can hurt performance, and is not recommended. (https://react.dev/learn/you-might-not-need-an-effect).

Expected an assignment or function call and instead saw an expression.

Error: Calling setState synchronously within an effect can trigger cascading renders

Effects are intended to synchronize state between React and external systems such as manually updating the DOM, state management libraries, or other platform APIs. In general, the body of an effect should do one or both of the following:
* Update external systems with the latest state from React.
* Subscribe for updates from some external system, calling setState in a callback function when external state changes.

Calling setState synchronously within an effect body causes cascading renders that can hurt performance, and is not recommended. (https://react.dev/learn/you-might-not-need-an-effect).

Share Project ‚Ä¢ "duplicate" - Duplicate Project ‚Ä¢ "delete" - Delete Project ‚Ä¢ "rename" - Rename Project **VIEW COMMANDS:** ‚Ä¢ "dark" / "light" / "theme" - Toggle Theme ‚Ä¢ "fullscreen" - Toggle Fullscreen ‚Ä¢ "sidebar" - Error: Calling setState synchronously within an effect can trigger cascading renders

Effects are intended to synchronize state between React and external systems such as manually updating the DOM, state management libraries, or other platform APIs. In general, the body of an effect should do one or both of the following:
* Update external systems with the latest state from React.
* Subscribe for updates from some external system, calling setState in a callback function when external state changes.

Calling setState synchronously within an effect body causes cascading renders that can hurt performance, and is not recommended. (https://react.dev/learn/you-might-not-need-an-effect).

import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './PortfolioQR.css'; const PortfolioQR = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('generator'); const [qrStyle, setQrStyle] = useState('gradient'); const [showDownload, setShowDownload] = useState(false); // User portfolio data const portfolioData = { username: '@sarahcreates', portfolioUrl: 'https://fortheweebs.netlify.app/portfolio/sarahcreates', qrCode: 'data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAAABCAYAAAAfFcSJAAAADUlEQVR42mNk+M9QDwADhgGAWjR9awAAAABJRU5ErkJggg==', // Placeholder totalScans: 847, scansThisWeek: 127, topLocations: [ { city: 'San Francisco', country: 'USA', scans: 234, percent: 28 }, { city: 'Los Angeles', country: 'USA', scans: 156, percent: 18 }, { city: 'New York', country: 'USA', scans: 142, percent: 17 }, { city: 'Toronto', country: 'Canada', scans: 98, percent: 12 } ], scansByDevice: [ { device: 'iPhone', scans: 412, percent: 49 }, { device: 'Android', scans: 298, percent: 35 }, { device: 'iPad', scans: 89, percent: 10 }, { device: 'Other', scans: 48, percent: 6 } ], conversionRate: 34, // % who scanned and then signed up newFollowers: 289, // from QR scans projectViews: 3456 // from QR traffic }; // QR Code styles const qrStyles = [ { id: 'gradient', name: 'Gradient Purple', preview: 'üü£', colors: ['#8b5cf6', '#ec4899'] }, { id: 'neon', name: 'Neon Green', preview: 'üü¢', colors: ['#10b981', '#059669'] }, { id: 'gold', name: 'Gold Luxury', preview: 'üü°', colors: ['#f59e0b', '#fbbf24'] }, { id: 'minimal', name: 'Minimal Black', preview: '‚ö´', colors: ['#000000', '#1a1a1a'] }, { id: 'cyberpunk', name: 'Cyberpunk', preview: 'üîµ', colors: ['#06b6d4', '#ec4899'] } ]; // Use cases const useCases = [ { icon: 'üíº', title: 'Business Cards', description: 'Print QR on your cards for instant portfolio access', popularity: '87% of users' }, { icon: 'üé§', title: 'Conference Talks', description: 'Show QR on slides, audience scans to see your work', popularity: '62% of users' }, { icon: 'üì±', title: 'Social Media Bio', description: 'Post QR image, followers scan to explore portfolio', popularity: '74% of users' }, { icon: 'üñºÔ∏è', title: 'Physical Artwork', description: 'Add QR sticker to prints, buyers see your full gallery', popularity: '45% of users' }, { icon: 'üìß', title: 'Email Signature', description: 'Include QR in signature for professional networking', popularity: '56% of users' }, { icon: 'üé®', title: 'Portfolio Presentations', description: 'End presentations with QR for follow-up engagement', popularity: '69% of users' } ]; const downloadQR = (format) => { // In real app: Generate and download QR code setShowDownload(true); setTimeout(() => setShowDownload(false), 2000); alert(`QR Code downloaded as ${format.toUpperCase()}!`); }; return (

‚Äî Sarah Kim, Content Creator

üöÄ Viral Growth Potential

Every QR code scan is a direct connection to your portfolio. No search engines, no social media algorithms, no gatekeepers. Just instant access to your work. This creates a powerful offline-to-online funnel that most creators completely miss.

import React, { useState } from 'react'; /** * VIP Welcome Letter - Shown to $1000 tier holders upon first login * Explains superpowers without revealing owner's specific use cases */ export const VIPWelcomeLetter = ({ onDismiss }) => { const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1); const totalPages = 4; return (
{/* VIP Badge */}
üëë VIP MEMBER - $1000 TIER üëë
{/* Page 1: Welcome */} {currentPage === 1 && (

Welcome to Elite Access

Thank you for joining the exclusive group of 100 VIP members who power this platform.

Your VIP Benefits:

‚úÖ FREE Lifetime Access - All content, all creators, forever
‚úÖ Three AI Superpowers - Advanced tools unavailable to others
‚úÖ Zero Monthly Fees - No subscriptions, no per-creator charges
‚úÖ Priority Support - Direct access to platform assistance
‚úÖ Exclusive Community - Join 99 other elite members
The next pages will explain your three exclusive AI superpowers.
)} {/* Page 2: Universal AI Content Generator */} {currentPage === 2 && (
‚ö°

Superpower #1: Universal AI Generator

Create any type of content from reference images and your creative vision.

How It Works:

  1. Upload reference images (characters, scenes, objects, anything)
  2. Describe what you want to create in detailed context
  3. Choose content type: Video, Image, Audio, or Animation
  4. Select output style: Realistic, Anime, Artistic, Cinematic, 3D, or Pixel Art
  5. AI generates your custom content

Advanced Features:

  • Style Transfer Technology - Creates similar content without copying originals (avoids copyright)
  • Context-Aware AI - Understands your creative vision and generates accordingly
  • Multi-Format Output - Videos, images, audio, animations - all from one tool
  • Professional Quality - HD output suitable for commercial use
Use this power for any creative project - the possibilities are limitless.
)} {/* Page 3: AI Studio */} {currentPage === 3 && (
üé®

Superpower #2: AI Studio

A specialized suite of three powerful AI modules for advanced content creation.

Module 1: Character Recognition

Upload any character image and AI identifies:

  • Character name and source material
  • Visual traits and characteristics
  • Voice profile for synthesis
  • 95%+ accuracy confidence scores

Module 2: Voice Synthesis

Generate character voice audio:

  • Input text ‚Üí Character speaks it in their voice
  • High-quality voice cloning technology
  • Natural speech patterns and emotions
  • Export audio files for any project

Module 3: CGI Video Generator

Create CGI videos with:

  • Multiple reference images
  • Generated voice audio integration
  • Style presets (realistic, anime, artistic, cinematic)
  • Style transfer to avoid copyright issues
Perfect for content creators, artists, and storytellers.
)} {/* Page 4: Facial Media Sorter */} {currentPage === 4 && (
üë§

Superpower #3: Facial Media Sorter

Organize thousands of images instantly with AI-powered facial recognition and intelligent naming.

The Problem It Solves:

Have hundreds or thousands of images that need organizing? Manually sorting and naming them would take days or weeks. This tool does it automatically in minutes.

How It Works:

  1. Bulk Upload - Drop in hundreds or thousands of images
  2. AI Analysis - Detects and groups all faces automatically
  3. Smart Naming - Assign character names to each group
  4. Sequential Numbering - Files renamed: CharacterName_001.jpg, CharacterName_002.jpg, etc.
  5. Organized Download - Get all files properly named and sorted

Key Features:

  • Face Detection - Identifies all faces across your image library
  • Face Clustering - Groups identical faces together automatically
  • Character Recognition - AI suggests character names
  • Batch Renaming - Apply naming rules to entire groups instantly
  • Group Downloads - Download by character or all at once
Save hours of manual work - let AI organize your media library.
)} {/* Navigation */}
{[1, 2, 3, 4].map(page => (
))}
{currentPage < totalPages ? ( ) : ( )}
); };

> 38 |       ? renderTimes.current.reduce((a, b) => a + b, 0) / renderTimes.current.length
     |         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Passing a ref to a function may read its value during render
  39 |       : 0
  40 |   };
  41 | }

Error: Cannot access refs during render

React refs are values that are not needed for rendering. Refs should only be accessed outside of render, such as in event handlers or effects. Accessing a ref value (the `current` property) during render can cause your component not to update as expected (https://react.dev/reference/react/useRef).

  36 |     renderCount: renderCount.current,
  37 |     averageRenderTime: renderTimes.current.length > 0
> 38 |       ? renderTimes.current.reduce((a, b) => a + b, 0) / renderTimes.current.length
     |                                                          ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Cannot access ref value during render
  39 |       : 0
  40 |   };
  41 | }

import React from 'react'; import './Compliance2257.css'; const Compliance2257 = () => { return (

18 U.S.C. 2257 Record-Keeping Requirements Compliance Statement

Age Verification Statement

All models, actors, actresses and other persons that appear in any visual depiction of actual sexually explicit conduct appearing or otherwise contained in this website were over the age of eighteen (18) years at the time of the creation of such depictions.

Record-Keeping Requirements

The records required by 18 U.S.C. ¬ß 2257 and 28 C.F.R. ¬ß 75 for materials contained in this website are kept by the designated Custodian of Records listed below.

Custodian of Records

Name: ForTheWeebs LLC

Attention: Custodian of Records - 2257 Compliance

Address: {process.env.CUSTODIAN_ADDRESS_LINE1 || '[Add CUSTODIAN_ADDRESS_LINE1 to .env]'}

{process.env.CUSTODIAN_ADDRESS_LINE2 &&

Suite/Unit: {process.env.CUSTODIAN_ADDRESS_LINE2}

}

City, State, ZIP: {process.env.CUSTODIAN_CITY || '[CITY]'}, {process.env.CUSTODIAN_STATE || '[STATE]'} {process.env.CUSTODIAN_ZIP || '[ZIP]'}

Country: United States

Phone: {process.env.CUSTODIAN_PHONE || '[Add CUSTODIAN_PHONE to .env]'}

Email: {process.env.CUSTODIAN_EMAIL || 'custodian@fortheweebs.com'}

‚öôÔ∏è Setup Required: Add custodian information to your .env file. Must be a physical address (P.O. Box not allowed). See .env.example for template.

Platform Structure: Primary vs. Secondary Producers

ForTheWeebs as Primary Producer

For content produced directly by ForTheWeebs (platform-created materials, promotional content, tutorials), ForTheWeebs maintains all required records in accordance with 18 U.S.C. ¬ß 2257.

Content Creators as Secondary Producers

ForTheWeebs operates as a hosting and distribution platform for user-generated content. Individual content creators ("Secondary Producers") who upload sexually explicit content to this platform are independently responsible for:

  • Verifying the age of all performers appearing in their content
  • Maintaining records as required by 18 U.S.C. ¬ß 2257
  • Designating their own Custodian of Records
  • Making records available for inspection upon lawful request
  • Displaying their own 2257 compliance statement on their content

Creator Requirements

All creators who post adult content on ForTheWeebs must comply with the following:

1. Age Verification

Creators must verify their own age (18+) through government-issued photo ID.

2. Performer Verification

Creators must obtain and maintain copies of government-issued photo identification for all performers appearing in sexually explicit content.

3. Record Retention

Records must be maintained for a minimum of seven (7) years after the content is no longer available on the platform.

4. Record Contents

Records must include:

  • Performer's legal name and any stage names used
  • Date of birth
  • Copy of valid government-issued photo ID
  • Date of production for each piece of content
  • URLs or identifiers for all content featuring each performer

5. Inspection Rights

Records must be made available for inspection by the Attorney General or their designee upon request within twenty (20) business days.

6. Compliance Statement

Creators must display their own 2257 compliance statement including their designated Custodian of Records information on all content pages.

Prohibited Content

The following content is strictly prohibited on ForTheWeebs:

  • Child Sexual Abuse Material (CSAM): Any content depicting minors in sexual situations
  • Non-Consensual Content: Revenge porn, hidden camera footage, or any content uploaded without performer consent
  • Content Depicting Minors: Any content featuring or appearing to feature individuals under 18 years of age
  • Bestiality: Sexual content involving animals
  • Incest: Content depicting sexual relations between family members
  • Extreme Violence: Content depicting rape, torture, or non-consensual violence

Platform Responsibilities

ForTheWeebs takes the following measures to ensure compliance:

  • Age verification for all users accessing adult content
  • Age verification for all creators posting adult content
  • AI-powered content moderation to detect prohibited content
  • Automated CSAM detection and reporting to NCMEC
  • Review and approval process for adult content creators

  • 18 U.S.C. ¬ß 2258A - Reporting requirements for electronic communication service providers and remote computing service providers

Questions or Concerns

Custodian of Records

Phone: [YOUR PHONE NUMBER]

import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import './ParentalControls.css'; const ParentalControls = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); return (

Parental Controls & Safety

Your child's safety is our priority. ForTheWeebs provides comprehensive tools to help you manage and monitor your child's experience.

{/* Overview */}

Overview

ForTheWeebs is built with families in mind. While our platform hosts a diverse range of content including adult material, we provide robust parental controls to ensure your child only accesses age-appropriate content. You maintain complete control over what your child can see and do on our platform.

{/* Key Features */}

Key Parental Control Features

üîí

Age Verification & Restrictions

All accounts require age verification. Adult content (18+) is automatically blocked for accounts registered as minors. This restriction cannot be bypassed without parental authorization.

üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüë¶

Family Account Management

Create sub-accounts for your children under your parent account. Set individual permissions, content filters, and screen time limits for each child. Monitor activity across all linked accounts from one dashboard.

üéØ

Content Filtering

Customize content filters by category, creator, and content type. Choose from preset age groups (All Ages, 13+, 16+, 18+) or create custom filters. Block specific creators, keywords, or content categories entirely.

‚è∞

Screen Time Controls

Set daily or weekly time limits for platform usage. Schedule "offline hours" during bedtime, homework time, or family time. Receive notifications when limits are approaching or exceeded.

üìä

Activity Monitoring

View detailed reports of your child's activity including watch history, searches, creators followed, and interactions. All monitoring is transparent‚Äîyour child knows when parental controls are active.

üí¨

Communication Controls

Control who can message your child. Options include: only approved contacts, no one, or approved creators only. Comments and live chat can be disabled entirely for added safety.

üõ°Ô∏è

AI-Powered Safety

Our AI constantly monitors content for inappropriate material, hate speech, bullying, and predatory behavior. Content is automatically flagged and removed, and parents are notified of any concerning interactions.

üö®

Instant Alerts

Receive real-time alerts via email or SMS when your child attempts to access restricted content, receives messages from unknown users, or when suspicious activity is detected.

{/* How to Set Up */}

How to Set Up Parental Controls

  1. Create a Parent Account: Sign up as a parent/guardian and verify your identity through our secure verification process.
  2. Add Child Accounts: Create accounts for your children, specifying their ages and selecting an appropriate content rating.
  3. Configure Settings: Access the Parental Controls dashboard to customize filters, time limits, and monitoring preferences.
  4. Review & Approve: Browse content together with your child and approve creators, channels, or specific videos they can watch.
  5. Monitor Regularly: Check activity reports weekly to stay informed about your child's viewing habits and interactions.
{/* Educational Resources */}

Educational Content

ForTheWeebs hosts extensive educational content across various subjects. Use parental controls to curate a learning environment tailored to your child's interests and educational needs. Filter by educational categories like:

  • Science & Technology
  • Art & Creative Skills
  • Language Learning
  • History & Culture
  • Mathematics & Logic
  • Music & Performance
{/* Safety Tips */}

Safety Tips for Parents

  • Have regular conversations with your child about online safety and appropriate content
  • Keep devices in common areas where you can observe usage
  • Review your child's watch history and subscriptions together
  • Teach your child to report uncomfortable interactions immediately
  • Start with strict controls and gradually loosen them as your child demonstrates responsibility
  • Be transparent about monitoring‚Äîit builds trust and awareness
  • Set clear family rules about screen time and online behavior
{/* Reporting & Support */}

Reporting & Support

If you encounter inappropriate content or concerning behavior, report it immediately. Our moderation team reviews all reports within 24 hours. For urgent safety concerns, contact our dedicated parent support line.

Parent Support: parents@fortheweebs.com

Report Content: Available on every video and in every chat

Emergency Contact: Contact local authorities for immediate threats

{/* Privacy */}

Privacy & Child Data Protection

We are COPPA (Children's Online Privacy Protection Act) compliant. We do not collect personal information from children under 13 without verifiable parental consent. Child accounts have enhanced privacy protections:

  • Profiles are private by default
  • Location services are disabled
  • Personal information cannot be shared publicly
  • Targeted advertising is disabled for minors
  • Data is never sold to third parties (this applies to ALL users, not just children)
{/* CTA */}

Get Started with Parental Controls

Create a family account today and experience safe, controlled content access for your children.

{/* Footer Nav */}
); }; export default ParentalControls;

// Detect user's preferred language
export function detectUserLanguage() {
    try {
        // Try browser language
        const browserLang = navigator.language || navigator.userLanguage;

        // Check if exact match exists
        if (LANGUAGES[browserLang]) {
            return browserLang;
        }

        // Check if language code (without region) exists
        const langCode = browserLang.split('-')[0];
        if (LANGUAGES[langCode]) {
            return langCode;
        }

        // Special cases
        if (browserLang.startsWith('zh')) {
            return browserLang.includes('TW') || browserLang.includes('HK') ? 'zh-TW' : 'zh-CN';
        }

        return 'en'; // Default to English
    } catch (error) {
        console.error('Language detection error:', error);
        return 'en';
    }
}

// Get current language
export function getCurrentLanguage() {
    return localStorage.getItem('preferred_language') || detectUserLanguage();
}

// Set preferred language
export function setLanguage(langCode) {
    if (LANGUAGES[langCode]) {
        localStorage.setItem('preferred_language', langCode);

        // Apply RTL if needed
        const isRTL = LANGUAGES[langCode].rtl;
        document.documentElement.dir = isRTL ? 'rtl' : 'ltr';
        document.documentElement.lang = langCode;

        return true;
    }
    return false;
}

// Get translation
export function t(key, langCode = null) {
    const lang = langCode || getCurrentLanguage();
    const translations = TRANSLATIONS[lang] || TRANSLATIONS.en;
    return translations[key] || TRANSLATIONS.en[key] || key;
}

// Translate with fallback
export function translate(key, variables = {}) {
    let text = t(key);

    // Replace variables in translation
    Object.keys(variables).forEach(varKey => {
        text = text.replace(`{${varKey}}`, variables[varKey]);
    });

    return text;
}

// Initialize language on app load
export function initLanguage() {
    const lang = getCurrentLanguage();
    setLanguage(lang);
    return lang;
}

// Get all available languages for selector
export function getAvailableLanguages() {
    return Object.entries(LANGUAGES).map(([code, info]) => ({
        code,
        ...info
    }));
}
